metadata.title: CVE-2024-57184 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in GPAC v0.8.0, as demonstrated by MP4Box. Itcontains a heap-based buffer overflow in gf_m2ts_process_pmt inmedia_tools/mpegts.c:2163 that can cause a denial of service (DOS) via acrafted MP4 file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-57184` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gpac - 2.0.0+dfsg1-2
gpac-modules-base - 2.0.0+dfsg1-2
libgpac11 - 2.0.0+dfsg1-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gpac package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.0+dfsg1-2').
